meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Amanda Garrett Chris Gunter Greg Seroka Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7060.

td.p: Amanda Garrett, a telecommunications technician from Greenville, South Carolina
Chris Gunter, a stay-at-home parent from Rochester, New York
Greg Seroka, a chef from Steamboat Springs, Colorado (whose 6-day cash winnings total $150,800)

tr.td: BOOKS BY CELEBS
TRAVELING
CARD TRICKS
TECHNOLOGY & STUFF
"OLO"
THE VOYAGE OF THE BOUNTY
(Sarah: We're taking you on [*], both before and after the infamous mutiny.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'For his 98th birthday in 2014, this rugged-chinned actor & father of Michael released "Life Could be Verse"')

tr.td: Greg
Chris
Amanda
TV "NIGHT"
SCALY CRITTERS
RELIGION
(Alex: We want you to name the play in...)
NICE ENDING, SHAKESPEARE!
WARSAW PACT ALUMNI NATIONS
RHYME SCHOOL
(Alex: Because each correct response in that category will rhyme with the word "school".)
